wma_reload_loc_desc:
Press this button if you installed or uninstalled custom weapons
or switched languages
wma_import_pdth_desc:
Only press this if you have PDTH Challenges Standalone installed
and want to import your progress.
wma_import_pdth_confirm_desc:
If you click this, any nonzero progress in PDTH Challenges
will be added to your WMA progress.
wma_import_pdth_fail_desc: Ensure you have the PDTH Challenges Standalone installed and updated to port your progress.
wma_import_pdth_complete_desc:
Progress has been imported.
Have fun!
